question: Which nation is geologically associated with the "Bangui Magnetic Anomaly"?
explanation: Bangui Magnetic Anomaly is the Earth's magnetic field located at Bangui, the capital of Central African Republic. This anomaly is elliptical. It is surrounded by Walvis Ridge, Cameroon-St. Helena Volcanic Line and the Mid-Atlantic Ridge. It is one of the largest and most intense crustal magnetic anomalies on the African continent.
